content: If a factory produces 500 units of a product every day, how many units will it produce in a non-leap year?

A non-leap year has 365 days. If the factory produces 500 units every day, then the total production in a non-leap year would be:

500 units/day × 365 days/year = 182,500 units/year

So, the factory will produce 182,500 units in a non-leap year.
